lexUnit.name: fasten.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: close or do up securely

sentence.text: It was rather like a large belt ; you could probably fasten it about your waist and it would sit snugly over your hips .
He fastened his seat belt without speaking and the Rover slid gently into Broadway , the road he had crossed less than a fortnight earlier on his way to see Sir Paul Berowne .
Melissa fastened her safety belt and reached for the ignition .
Of that I have no doubt , but I am equally certain that it was his own hands which fastened his belt around his neck and fumbled for the window bar .
` Please extinguish all cigarettes and fasten seat belts , " the pilot says in English .
Instead she contented herself with glaring coldly at him as she fastened the seatbelt .
Joe fastened the wet flannel around her ankle again .
Madeleine fastened his napkin around his neck .
Quickly I fastened my veil around my face .
An hour later I was fastening my safety-belt at LAX .
Unable to continue , she gestured to Ellen to fasten the ties at the back of her gown .
He fastened the dress with clumsy fingers , for a moment hating himself .
In a last defiant gesture Diana fastened the letter with red sealing wax and had it hand-delivered , just as Prince Philip had done with the one he sent to her .
He fastens the bandage with sticky tape .
The six relics go in , and , after carefully expelling all air , I fasten the neck with string and push it into the white saddlebag .
And without more ado the two officers fastened their clips about their ankles , wheeled out with velocipedes and were on their way .
She would fasten the ring about her neck and wear it for Johnny , as he had asked her to do .
He fastened his cloak round his shoulders .
Garvey chortled and went on fastening his boots .
She eats a pistachio nut , and fastens her locket .
The doorbell rang as Juliet fastened her black sandals .
Before she could say any more , he settled the helmet down over his head and fastened the strap .
Sara fastened her bra and pulled on her shirt .
Quickly slipping into a sleeveless straight shirt-waister dress of pink shantung , Laura was just fastening the last button when she heard the sound of the doorbell .
Her mother fastening Melanie 's coat snugly at the neck and tucking in a scarf .
